description.value:
Aura 4

Each enemy that starts its turn within the aura takes 20 psychic damage, and takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the start of its next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

+32 vs Fortitude; 3d8+10 damage, and the target is weakened until the end of Belashyrra's next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Reach 3

+30 vs Fortitude; 3d8+10 damage, and ongoing 15 poison damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Psychic

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 10

+32 vs Will; 3d8+8 psychic damage.

At-Will

Standard

Belashyrra makes a corrupting touch attack and a tentacle whip attack.

Recharge 4-6

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When an enemy moves or shifts into a square adjacent to belashyrra, recharge

Belashyrra makes a corrupting touch attack.

At-Will ✦ Charm

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 10

+32 vs Will; the target is dominated (save ends). Aftereffect: The target is dazed (save ends).

Minor, Recharges When First Bloodied

Ranged 10

Trigger: When first bloodied

+32 vs Will; the target is blinded (save ends). Belashyrra can see through the otherwise blind eyes of the target and use the target as the origin point for his ranged attacks. Second Failed Saving Throw: If the target fails two saving throws against this power, the blindness becomes permanent. The Remove Affliction ritual will remove this effect, but the skill check takes a -15 penalty. Otherwise, only Belashyrra's death can remove the effect.

PsychicTeleportation

Standard, Recharges When First Bloodied

Close burst 3

Trigger: When first bloodied

+30 vs Reflex; 5d8+10 psychic damage. Effect: Belashyrra teleports up to 10 squares or to any square adjacent to a creature currently blinded by eye thief.
If an enemy attacks Belashyrra's Will and hits with a charm or psychic attack or with a mind-reading power, that enemy takes 20 psychic damage and is dazed until the end of its next turn.
